p1: My name is Zoryah Gray. I am a current senior at Northwestern Univeristy, graduating in June 2025, studying Computer Science (B.A.) with a focus in full stack and software engineering. I am also a QuestBridge Match Scholarship Recipient from Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
p2: I am currently working with Tunepad to create an online learning interactive for Tunepads learn platform. In my free time, I am working on developing a 2D adventure platformer and a 3D mystery game. I really enjoy working on front-end projects to create seamless and visually appealing designs to enhance user experiences. I have an interest in game development, front and backend development, and learning efficient backend protocols and systems to enhance my UI/UX skillset.
